Reed, Ph.D. Wayne F. Reed, Ph.D. Professor Murchison-Mallory Professor of Physics | Undergraduate Advisor wreed@tulane.edu (504) 862-3185 | Lab Phone: (504) 862-5523 Ph.D., Clarkson (1984) My research interests include Polymer Physics & Biophysics. Recipient of Tulane SSE Outstanding Researcher Award (2012) Monitoring Polymerization Reactions: From Fundamentals to Applications. Eds. Alina M. Alb, Wayne F. Reed. Book invited by Wiley Interscience. Publication in October 2013. C. Brusamarello, M.F. Drenski, A. Isakov, W.F.
